short_summary: Parks Canada Agency (PCA) wishes to invite suppliers to participate in the National Pass Program 2023 for the printed and fulfilled pass distribution.
description: The Public Services and Procurement Canada, on behalf of Parks Canada Agency (PCA), is releasing this Invitation To Qualify (ITQ) for suppliers interested to qualify to participate in this procurement process in accordance with the ITQ evaluation procedures and basis of qualification for the National Pass Program 2023 for Parks Canada Agency (PCA).

full_summary:
## Invitation to Qualify: Print and Fulfillment Solution
### Government of Canada Tender Notice

**Reference Number:** [WS3393316318 - Doc4219818950]
**Publication Date:** September 19, 2023
**Tender Closing Date:** October 20, 2023 at 14:00 (Eastern Time)

### Invitation Details

Parks Canada Agency invites qualified suppliers to participate in the printing and fulfillment solution procurement process. This Invitation to Qualify (ITQ) is the first step in a series of procurement activities for the National Pass Program 2023.

**Procurement Overview**
This procurement is governed by the Trade Agreements Act and is open to all qualified suppliers.

**Scope**
The requirement is for a comprehensive print and fulfillment solution, including e-commerce system software as a service, printing services, and the related infrastructure.

**Basis of Qualification**
Participating suppliers must meet the eligibility criteria outlined in the ITQ documents. The evaluation will be based on the merit of each supplier's qualifications and experience.

**Key Dates**
* **Tender Closing Date:** October 20, 2023 at 14:00 (Eastern Time)
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** Not specified
* **Expected Contract End Date:** March 31, 2029

### Contact Information

If you have any questions or require further information, please contact:

* Andrea Keyserlingk, Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* Email: [andrea.keyserlingk@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:andrea.keyserlingk@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* Phone: Not available
* Fax: Not available

### Additional Resources
For more information, please visit the following link: [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17489664?extsite=MTc0ODk2NjRfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17489664?extsite=MTc0ODk2NjRfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)  External KB Manual: https://external_url
